It is comprised of nine members, and it is led by a governing board. Alicia is the president. The businesses that the members of the communal bank carry out are varied. Among them are carpentry, making ‘picos’ and ‘chuntillos’ [rustic tools], selling sweets, selling food, weaving blankets, making foam decorations, and a neighborhood store.

The loan they will take out will benefit the small businesswomen in the group, of which Alicia is a member.  She says that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for two cycles.  She joined by invitation from a friend who is a member of the institution.

She currently has a business of selling sweets.  She learned this from a friend who she helped with sales.  Alicia later undertook her own business.  The loan that she will now take out is to expand and improve the business (to buy sweets and flour).  She will make her purchases at the fairs in the city of El Alto.  She will later prepare and sell the sweets at her sales location.  This way of working allows her to generate resources to support her family as much as she can.  She is in a common-law marriage, and she has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the health and loan trainings and the savings.

loans.use: to buy sweets and flour.

loans.name: Juliette

texts.fr: Agée de 33 ans et mère de quatre enfants scolarisés, Juliette a ouvert une boutique sise à son domicile où elle vend des boîtes de maillonnaise, de café, des paquets de macaroni et du savon depuis quelques années. Elle fait ses approvisionnements dans l'un des marchés de la sous région. Dans le but d'accroître son chiffre d'affaire et de combler les attentes de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à finadev en vue de renforcer son fonds de commerce et de maximiser son profit. Le surplus lui permettra d'acheter des médicaments pour sa mère et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
A 33-year-old mother of four children, Juliette opened a shop located in her home where she has been selling containers of mayonnaise and coffee, packets of macaroni, and soap for a few years. She makes her purchases at one of the markets in her sub-region. 

With the goal of increasing her sales and fulfilling the expectations of her customers, she requested and obtained a micro-loan from Finadev with the aim of bolstering her business capital and to maximize her profit. The surplus will enable her to buy some medicine for her mother and to help cover her children's schooling costs.

loans.use: to buy 2 boxes of milk, a box of mayonnaise, 10 packets of sugar, and a dozen cans of coffee

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
El socio es el señor  Ronald, él pertenece al banco comunal “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. El socio es padre de familia casado con 3 hijos en edad escolar y dependientes de él,  Ronald tiene una tienda en la cual se dedica al comercio de productos de belleza en la modalidad de electro domésticos como  planchas para el cabello, rizadoras,  secadores de pelo etc. Ronald en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para comprar mercadería como ceras depiladoras y maquinas de hidro masajes para pies.
El gran sueño de Ronald es poder educar a sus hijos en la universidad y ofrecerles un mejor futuro, pero sabe que esforzándose y trabajando mucho el podrá hacerlo. Ronald agradece a  KIVA por permitirle desarrollarse con su actividad y por ayudarlo con la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Member Ronald belongs to The Sons of Qolquewasi Communal Bank in the city of Cusco, Peru. He is married and the father of a family with 3 children of school age who are dependent upon him. Ronald has a store in which he sells beauty products, especially domestic appliances such as hair irons, curling irons, hair driers, etc. Ronald now wishes to invest a new loan in purchasing merchandise such as hair removal wax, and foot hydro-massage appliances.

Ronald's grand dream is to be able to educate his children in the university and offer them a better future. But he knows he will have to put forth great effort and work hard to be able to do that. Ronald is grateful to Kiva for permitting him to develop in his activities and helping him with the education of his children.

loans.use: purchase hair-removal wax and foot hydro-massage appliances to sell.

loans.name: María Lourdes

texts.es:
María Lourdes es una fémina trabajadora y emprendedora de 56 años de edad. Ella inicio su pulpería hace 13 años con la venta de un bus que tenía junto a su marido que por problemas de salud ya no podía seguir con él. El crédito anterior le ayudo a diversificar su negocio ya que invirtió en ropa y calzado. 
Con este préstamo ella desea invertir en productos para surtir la venta principalmente en bebidas.
texts.en:
María Lourdes is a hard-working and enterprising woman of 56 years of age. She began her local store thirteen years ago with the sale of a bus that she had with her husband that, due to health problems, she could no longer continue with. The previous loan helped her diversify her business since she invested it in clothing and footwear.

With this loan she would like to invest in products with which to supply mainly drink sales.

loans.use: to buy drinks.

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.fr: Mère de 03 enfants dont 02 à l’école, madame Adjoa est mariée à un mécanicien à deux roues et âgée de 31ans. Elle est commerçante, vend des produits d’alimentation générale, de l'eau minérale et des boissons depuis 2010. Elle exerce seule cette activité dans une boutique et est confrontée aux problèmes de concurrence sur le terrain. Elle sollicite ce premier crédit de WAGES pour acheter des produits d’alimentation générale afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité, ouvrir une autre boutique des produits d’alimentation générale et associer la vente des produits congelés. Comme perspectives d’avenir pour sa famille, elle veut assurer un lendemain meilleur à ses progénitures.
texts.en:
Mrs. Adjoa, age 31, is the mother of three children, two of whom go to school. She is married to a bike mechanic. She has been selling general food products, mineral water and beverages since 2010. She works alone out of her store, and faces problems resulting from the competition that exists in this market. 

She is seeking this first loan from WAGES to buy general food items to better meet customer demand. She plans to reinvest on her activity, open another store, and add frozen food to her selection of merchandise for sale. 

In the long term, she wants to provide her children with a better future.

loans.use: to buy general food products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Nzembo Plus Group

texts.en:
Rene is 36 years old, married and the father of two children, ages 8 and 11. Both of them go to school.

Rene is the head of “Nzembo Plus,” made up of 10 members firmly united to receive loans from the MFI (micro-finance institution) HOPE RDC in order to develop their businesses.

Rene’s main business is helping people ship packages. His business is west of Kinshasa. Since 2002 he has acquired solid experience in this area and works hard with good management skills to realize his dream of one day building his own office. 

He would also like to achieve financial independence through his business, which earns $160 per week. He works to the best of his abilities and uses his contacts to achieve his goals. 

With his next loan, Rene will purchase some chairs and fix the waiting room.

loans.use: to purchase some chairs and fix a waiting room for his package-shipping business.

loans.name: Ny

texts.en: Ny is 45 years old. She is married and resides with her three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling Khmer noodles and fried bananas for more than seven years, earning approximately $12 each day. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is a chef who earns about $7 each day. Two of her children are employed on a rubber plantation. They earn about $8 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Ny is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase rubber plants to cultivate. This money will help her run a new business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to purchase more farmland for cultivating rubber plants and to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase rubber plants to cultivate

loans.name: Juanito

texts.es: El Sr. Juanito tiene 48 años, esta casado con la señora  Martha tiene dos hijos que tiene la edad de 25 y 23 años,  que están en la universidad estudiando juntos, la familia  viven en la ciudad de La Paz, el Sr. Juanito se dedica a la venta de   distintos artículos  como ser cables, enchufes, DVD, cargadores de celular, etc.  y  el préstamo  lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería cargadores de celulares por mayor para surtir su mercadería,  El cliente se siente muy feliz por ser beneficiado por el crédito Kiva ya que le será de mucha utilidad para el y para su negocio, el deseo del Sr. Juanito es el de poder ver a sus hijos profesionales, tener un negocio rentable que le genera más ingresos.
texts.en: Juanito is 48 years old and married to Martha. They have two children who are 25 and 23 years old and are studying together at university. The family lives in the city of La Paz. Juanito works selling various articles such as cables, plugs, DVDs, phone chargers, etc. He will invest the loan in purchasing merchandise like wholesale phone chargers to stock his wares. He feels very happy to be benefitting from the Kiva credit since it will be very useful to him and his business. Juanito's wish is to see his children become professionals and to have a profitable business that generates more income for him.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like phone chargers.

loans.name: Kokouvi

texts.fr: Mr Kokouvi est marié à une coiffeuse. Il a 45ans et a 04 enfants. Ils sont tous sur les bancs de l’école. Le plus âgé a 24ans et le dernier 07ans. Il a pour profession infirmier. C’est depuis 1999, qu’il exerce ce métier. Il a été engagé dans une école pour soigner les élèves en cas de besoin mais la possibilité aussi lui a été donnée de prendre soin des patients de l’extérieur. 08 employés l’aident et il sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour s’acheter des produits pharmaceutiques. Il veut épargner pour achever son chantier, créer une clinique plus tard et permettre à ses enfants de mieux se scolariser.
texts.en: Mr. Kokouvi is married to a hairdresser.  He is 45 years and has four children.   They all attend school.  The oldest is 24 and the youngest is 7.  He is a nurse by profession.  He has been doing this type of work since 1999.  He was hired by a school to care for children who needed it, but he was also given the opportunity to care for patients outside of the school.  Eight employees help him and he is requesting a second loan through WAGES to buy pharmaceutical products.  He wants to save his money to construct a clinic in the future, and to allow his children to be better educated.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceutical products.

loans.name: Javier Alexander

texts.es: JAVIER ES UN JOVEN DE 24 AÑOS, SOLTERO Y CONOCIDO EN EL MEDIO, POR SU LABOR DE SERVICIO DE VENTA DE LECHE Y CRIANZA Y VENTA DE ANIMALES. EL VIVE EN EL PUEBLO DE CAYALTI AL NORTE DEL PERU. AHI VIVE CON SUS PADRES A QUIENES AYUDA CON LABORES EN GENERAL Y LO CUAL LOS HACE UNA FAMIIA MUY UNIDA. VIVE EN UNA COMUNIDAD DEDICADA AL COMERCIO, AGRICULTURA Y GANADERIA.  JAVIER EN PARTICULAR SE DEDICA A AL SERVICIO DE CRIANZA Y VENTA DE ANIMALES EN SU DOMICILIO EN LA PARTE DE ATRAS DE SU CASA. ES UNA PERSONA TRABAJADORA BUSCANDO SALIR ADELANTE Y AL MISMO TIEMPO AYUDAR A SUS PADRES. CON ESTE PROPOSITO BUSCA UN CREDITO DE 3000 SOLES CON EDPYME ALTERNATIVA. CON EL CRÉDITO COMPRARÁ MAS ANIMALES (PATOS, PAVOS, CHIVOS) PARA SURTIR SU NEGOCIO Y SU RESPECTIVA VENTA. ATENDIENDO LA DEMANDA INSATISFECHA EN EL LUGAR,  AMPLIARÁ SU CARTERA DE CLIENTES, CONTANDO CON CLIENTES NUEVOS E INGRESOS ADICIONALES A LA FAMILIA.
texts.en:
Javier, 24, is a single young man who is well-known in his environment because of his work selling milk and raising animals.  He lives in the town of Cayalti in north Perú.  He lives there with his parents who he helps with the general chores this very united family does.  He lives in a community dedicated to commerce, agriculture and animal husbandry.  

Javier in particular works raising and selling animals in his back yard.  He’s a hardworking person who is seeking to get ahead while at the same time helping his parents.  With this goal in mind he’s looking for a 2000 sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals (ducks, turkeys and goats) to stock his business and his respective sales thus meeting unmet local demand; he will expand his customer base adding new ones thus increasing family income.

loans.use: to buy more animals.

loans.name: Josphine

texts.en:
Josphine lives in the Changamwe area of Coast province. She is single. She owns a tailoring shop, which she has been operating for two years now. She also runs a retail shop.

She learnt about Milango through a friend who invited her to the group, and she joined the group with the aim of accessing credit to improve the operation of the business.

Josphine is applying for a loan of 41,900 Kenya shillings to purchase utensils, shoes, body lotions, and clothes for the shop.

loans.use: To purchase utensils, shoes, body lotions, and clothes.

loans.name: Yaneth

texts.es: La Sra. Yaneth tiene 27 años, tiene un hijo de la edad de 4 años. La Sra. Yaneth se dedica a la  actividad de venta de ropa de segunda mano, ella tiene su puesto de venta en uno de los mercados más concurridos de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Yaneth va a utilizar este préstamo para la compra de un fardo de ropa de temporada de invierno  como chompas y chamarras  y así de esta manera brindar variedad de sus productos  a  sus clientes e incrementar sus ganancias,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra. Yaneth va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando variedad de ropa según la temporada, la Sra. Yaneth  es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse y mantener a su familia.
texts.en: Yaneth, 27, has a four-year-old son.  She sells second-hand clothes in a stand in one of the city of Santa Cruz’s busiest markets.  This loan is her first sequence in the institution.  Yaneth will use this loan to buy a bundle of winter clothes like jackets and sweaters to provide a variety of products to her customers and increase her profits.  The reason for requesting this loan is to continue improving her business.  Yaneth will use profits to continue buying a variety of clothes according to the season.  Yaneth is a very hardworking person who feels happy about the opportunity being given her since it’s the only way she has to support herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy a bundle of clothes.

loans.name: Kenneth

texts.en:
Kenneth lives in the Kongowea area of Coast province, Kenya. He is single. He owns a retail shop, a business he has been operating for two years. In this shop, Kenneth sells assorted retail products.

He learnt about Milango through a friend with the aim of accessing credit to improve his business. The challenge he is facing is a lack of stock.

Kenneth is applying for a loan of 31,450 Kenya shillings to buy utensils, shoes and clothes. The extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to improve his living standard. His plan for the future is to open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy utensils, shoes and clothes.

loans.name: Philemon

texts.en:
Philemon lives in the Kongowea area of Coast province, Kenya. He is single. He owns a transport business, which he has been operating for five years.

He learned about Milango through a friend, with the aim of accessing credit to improve his business. The challenge he is facing is a lack of finance.

Philemon is applying for a loan of 62,650 Kenya shillings to purchase another motorbike. The extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to improve his living standard. His plan for the future is to buy three more motorbikes to boost his transport business.

loans.use: To purchase another motorbike.

loans.name: Pedro Raul

texts.es:
El socio es el señor  Pedro, él pertenece al banco comunal “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. El socio está casado y es padre de familia con 3 hijas en edad escolar y dependientes de él,  Pedro tiene una tienda en la cual se dedica al comercio de elementos de Artesanía, principalmente a lo referente a tejidos y tapices. Pedro en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para comprar mercadería como tapices y mantos con motivos indígenas.
El gran sueño de Pedro es poder educar a sus hijas en la universidad y ofrecerles un mejor futuro, además de enseñarles el valor del trabajo y del sacrificio para que sepan valorar las cosas que él buenamente puede darles. Pedro agradece a  KIVA por permitirle desarrollarse con su actividad y por ayudarlo con la educación de sus 3 hijas.
texts.en:
Pedro belongs to the “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” (Children of Qolquewasi) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.  He’s married and the father of three school age daughters who depend on him.  Pedro has a store where he sells crafts, especially those related to tapestries and weavings.  On this occasion, Pedro will use his loan to buy merchandise like tapestries and wall hangings with native motifs.

Pedro’s great dream is to be able to provide his daughters with university educations and to offer them a better future in addition to teaching them the value of work and sacrifice so that they will value what he’ s able to give them.  Pedro thanks Kiva for making it possible for him to develop in his activity and for helping him to educate his three daughters.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Reina

texts.es: La Sra. Reina tiene 36 años y es casada con un hijo de la edad de  6 años, la Sra. Reina se dedica a la venta de frutas en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la localidad de El torno,  este préstamo es su quinta secuencia  dentro de la institución, la Sra. Reina va a usar este préstamo para la compra de frutas por mayor,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital de trabajo, la Sra. Reina enfrenta retos en su negocio que son salir de la pobreza y  va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida y la  de su familia su  sueño para su negocio es ser una de las mejores comerciantes y crecer en su negocio para así generar más ingresos.
texts.en: Reina, 36, is married and has a six-year-old son.  She sells fruit in her stand located in El Torno.  This loan is her fifth sequence in the institution.  Reina will use this loan to buy fruit at wholesale.  Her reason for requesting this loan is lack of working capital.  The business challenge Reina faces is rising out of poverty and she will use profits to improve her and her family’s quality of life.  Her dream for her business is to become one of the best merchants and to grow in her business to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy fruit at wholesale.

loans.name: Nehema Plus Group

texts.en:
Makanga is the mother of two children, ages are 11 and 13. Both of them go to school.

She is the leader of “Nehema Plus,” which means “Grace” in English. It is composed of 12 members united in solidarity for receiving Kiva loans with the goal of developing their businesses.

Makanga is 32 years old and single. She has been active in her business since 2003. She is happy to be one of HOPE’s clients. Thanks to Hope’s loans, Makanga’s business generates a profit of about $100 per week. 

She intends with the next loan to increase her stock of goods by buying jewelry and reselling it to increase her working capital. Her ambition is to someday open a large shop. She is working hard to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy jewelry for resale.

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose a la ganaderia y agricultura ,la socia cria a las vacas para luego venderlas en las distintas ferias que se realizan los fines de semana en el distrito de Anta,la socia a la vez vende leche que extrae de las mismas vacas para distribuirlo a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a sus negocios,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de una vaca pequeña.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Leonarda continues working in agriculture and animal husbandry.  She raises cows to then sell in various street markets that take place on weekends in Anta District.  She also sells the milk she gets from those same cows to sell among her customers that request it.  She’s been in this business for years and does well thanks to the effort she puts into her businesses every day; this is how she supports her family.  She’s asking for the loan to buy a young cow.  She’s happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Emma Carola

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora  Emma, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. Nuestra socia  está casada y es madre de 3 pequeñas niñas,  Emma se dedica al comercio de Artesanías, principalmente de trabajos en  platería como adornos y joyas, los cuales comercializa en el distrito turistico de Machu Picchu. Emma trabaja con artesanías hace algún tiempo y es con esta actividad que mantiene su hogar y apoya a su esposo que se dedica a otras actividades. La socia en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para capitalizar su actividad y comprará joyería de plata.
Emma está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle educar a sus hijas y por ayudarla a mantenerse y desarrollarse con su actividad.
texts.en: Emma belongs to the “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” (Children of Qolquewasi) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.  She’s married and has three small daughters.  Emma sells crafts, especially works in silver like decorations and jewelry; she sells them in the Cusco tourist district of Machu Picchu.  She’s worked with crafts for some time now and by means of this work supports her house and helps her husband who does other things.  On this occasion, she will use her loan to capitalize her activity; she will buy silver jewelry.  Emma is very grateful to Kiva for allowing her to educate her daughters and to help her support herself and to develop in her activity.

loans.use: to buy silver jewelry.

loans.name: Duo Las Florecitas De Vista Hermosa Group

texts.es: Dúo Florecitas de Vista Hermosa :  María Rosaura es la encargada de este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa americana en la orilla de la carretera de su Aldea Vista Hermosa, también vende ganchos, cosméticos en general. Aun es soltera y le encanta vender, las personas la buscan mucho para poder comprar pantalones, playeras y ropa de bebe, ya que su mercadería es muy buena y clasificada. Le falta mucha ropa en la venta y desea comprar otra cantidad de ropa que le costara Q. 5,000.00 y no le alcanza el dinero que tiene, por tal motivo solicita nuevamente su ayuda para poder comprar la mercadería que necesita y así complacer  a sus clientes.
texts.en: The Dúo Florecitas de Vista Hermosa group is led by María Rosaura who sells American clothing alongside the village road.  Vista Hermosa also sells hair pins and cosmetics in general.  Although she is single, she loves to sell.  People seek her out so they can buy pants, beachwear and baby clothes because her merchandise is very good and well organized.  She is lacking many clothing articles and wishes to buy more for 5,000 GTQ, but she does not have enough money.  Therefore, she is requesting your help so she can buy the merchandise she needs to satisfy her customers.

loans.use: To buy pants, beachwear and baby clothes.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: La Sra. Rosa es soltera y tiene mucho dedicándose a la venta de ropa usada lo cual se ha convertido en una forma de ganarse la vida y de tal forma que se pueda solventar todos sus gastos. Ella piensa en su futuro en como podrá seguir con este pequeño negocio ya que ella pone todas su energías en vender en distintas partes de la ciudad y en mantener a sus clientes mas frecuentes. Ahora quiere tener ropa de temporada y para ello quiere invertir y así poder tener mayor cantidad de mercancía.
texts.en: Rosa’s single and has been selling used clothes for a long time; it’s become her source of livelihood and the means by which she covers all her expenses.  She thinks about how to stay in business in the future and to be able to continue with her small business that she puts all her energy into to sell in various parts of the city and retain her most loyal customers.  She wants to have seasonal clothes now and this is what she wants to invest in to have a larger amount of merchandise.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Luis Jesus

texts.es: Jesús un muchacho entusiasta y muy trabajador, desea terminar su preparatoria para poder desarrollarse en una carrera universitaria. El trabaja en una agencia aduanal de mensajero pero le están brindando el apoyo para seguir estudiando, sus padres el sr Luis y la Sra. Belem le ayudan en los gastos pero no es suficiente por lo cual tienen que trabajar conjuntamente en familia para solventar los gastos familiares. El dejo la escuela por necesidad pero no se arrepiente porque con ello ayudo a sus padres, ahora desea seguir preparándose para enfrentar los retos del futuro.
texts.en: Jesús is an enthusiastic, very hardworking young man.  He wants to finish high school so that he can enroll in the university.  He works at a customs agency as a messenger but they are helping him to continue studying.  His parents are Luis and Belem and they help him with his expenses but it’s not enough so they have to work hard together as a family to cover all family expenses.  He dropped out of school because of need but he’s not sorry about it because he was able to help his parents.  Now, he wants to continue preparing himself to face future challenges.

loans.use: to pay high school tuition and to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: ELSA TIENE 64 AÑOS DE EDAD, ES SOLTERA CON HIJOS DISIPADOS YA MAYORES. VIVE EN EL DISTRITO DE NUEVA ARICA AL NORTE DEL PERU Y TIENE MUY BUENAS RELACIONES CON SUS VECINOS. ELSA ES UNA PERSONA MUY TRABAJADORA A PESAR DE SU EDAD. PRECISAMENTE VIVIENDO SOLA Y CON GANAS DE SEGUIR ACTIVA ELSA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE ABARROTES,DESDE HACE MAS DE 12  AÑOS,EN SU PROPIO DOMICILIO. ESTE NEGOCIO A RESULTADO SER MUY BUENO PARA SU SALUD MENTAL Y RENTABLE. POR ESTE MOTIVO BUSCA CREDITO CON EDPYME ALTERNATIVA CON EL APOYO DE KIVA. EL PRESTAMO LO NECESITA PARA INVERTIR EN CAPITAL DE TRABAJO EN SU NEGOCIO Y ARREGLOS DE SU DOMICILIO , DE ESTA MANERA HACER CRECER SU NEGOCIO Y PODER MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en: Elsa, 64, is single; her children are all adults and live on their own.  She lives in Nueva Arica District in north Perú and gets along very well with her neighbors.  Elsa is a very hardworking person despite her age.  Precisely because she lives alone and wants to stay active, she’s been selling groceries at home for more than 12 years.  This business turned out to be quite good for her mental health and it’s also profitable.  Because of this she’s asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan with Kiva help.  She needs the loan to invest in working capital for her store and to do some home improvements.  In this way she will make her business grow and will be able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store and to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia y agricultura,la socia tiene vacas que son lecheras y la leche lo vende en los diferentes mercados,ella tiene un terreno donde siembra maiz y papa,en sus tiempos libres la socia le gusta llevas sus ganados a comer pasto,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de agricultura y ganaderia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

Filomena es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras la aprecian mucho.
texts.en:
Filomena is continuing with her farming and livestock business.  She has dairy cows, and she sells the milk in various markets.  She also has some land where she grows corn and potatoes.  In her free time she likes to take her cows to graze on grass.  Her dream is to expand and improve her business.  

Filomena is seeking this loan in order to buy seeds and fertilizer.  She is a hardworking and responsible person, and her fellow community bank members appreciate these these qualities in her.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Norma Lidia

texts.es: Norma tiene 31 años de edad es conviviente con 3  hijos. Vive en casa propia, con esposo que es peón agrícola, trabajando en parcelas aledañas. Entre los dos son muy trabjadores y buscan salir adelante juntos. Ellos viven en una zona rural en el distrito de Tambogrande en el Norte del Peru. Su pequeña comunidad ya cuentan con algunos servicios básicos como luz y electrica. Ella se dedica a la crianza de porcinos y aves de corral como actividad principal ya que cuenta con 12 cabezas de ganado porcino. La actividad se la reparten entre esposos los cuales se apoyan mutuamente. Se dedica a la crianza hace aproximadamente mas de 10 años. Solicita crédito para la compra de alimento balanceado para animales y mejoras en el corral de los mismos. Para eso cliente cuenta con los conocimientos para la adecuada alimentación de los animales. Clienta con amplia experiencia en el negocio, conocida en la zona.
texts.en: Norma, 31, lives with her spouse and three children in her own house; her husband is an agricultural day laborer working in neighboring parcels.  Between the two of them they work very hard striving to get ahead together.  They live in a rural zone of Tambogrande District in north Perú.  Her small community already has some basic utilities like electricity.  She works raising pigs and barnyard fowl; it’s her main activity and she currently owns 12 pigs.  The two spouses share work; they help each other out.  She’s been raising animals for approximately 10 years.  She’s asking for a loan to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed and to repair the corrals.  She has the required skills to feed the animals properly.  She has vast experience in the business and is well-known in the zone.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and to repair corrals.

loans.name: Las Flores De Chiaj Group

texts.es:
La señora Candelaria esta casada, tienen 37 años de edad, cursó los 2 años de educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos 1 de los cuales esta estudiando, se dedica a la compra y venta de animales domésticos, ella inicio este negocio con su señora madre y hasta el momento lleva 17 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al comercio.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para incrementar su negocio, en la compra de mas animales domésticos y luego venderlos para poder tener mas ganancias; en el futuro espera ser una compradora y vendedora a mayorista. Las demás integrantes se dedican al comercio, crianza de animales y a la artesanía.
texts.en:
Candelaria’s married and is 37-years-old.  She has two years of elementary school.  She has four children one of which is attending school.  She buys and sells domestic animals.  She started the business with her mother and to date has 17 years’ experience.   She has her husband’s support; he’s a merchant.

She organizes a group to request a loan that she’ll use to increase her business.  She will buy domestic animals and then resell them to earn more profits.  In the future she hopes to be a wholesale buyer and seller.  The other group members work in commerce, animal husbandry and crafts.

loans.use: to buy domestic animals to resell.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es:
La socia se dedica al negocio de ganaderia,la socia vende ganados que producen leche y luego lo vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 10 años en este negocio de ganaderia,la socia en sus tiempos libres le gusta jugar con sus 2 pequeños hijos,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante y su sueño es que sus hijos sean profesionales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar 1 ganado.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: She raises cattle that she then sells and she also sells the milk they produce from place to place.  She works from 5am until 6pm and has ten years’ experience in the cattle business.  In her free time she enjoys playing with her two little children.  She wants to get ahead by this means and her dream is that her children become professionals.  She’s requesting the loan to buy a head of cattle.  She’s happy with the loan and committed to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy a head of cattle.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: La joven María, de 26 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de Estelí, es madre soltera, tiene 2 hijos de 1 y 3 años de edad. Ella se dedica atender su negocio de alquiler de nintendo, lleva3 años con este negocio. Empezó con capital propio, ella dice que en este negocio la vista de los jóvenes y niños es muy constante sobre todo en su barrio donde esto se ha convertido en un lugar muy visitado pues no todos tienen acceso a tener video juegos en su casa pues es muy caro. Ella está requiriendo el préstamo para comprar videos juegos y dos televisores, pues el estar actualizados con los videos juegos es fundamental para su negocio, los videos más populares en su negocio es el Play Station 2. Entre sus planes esta ampliar más su negocio poner más consolas de video juegos, vender accesorios de nintendo.
texts.en:
María, 26, lives in the city of Estelí.  She’s a single mother.  She has two children who are 1 and 3 years of age.  She tends to a business leasing Nintendo games.  She’s had the business for three years.  She started out with her own capital.  She says that children and youngsters from the neighborhood visit her business constantly because not all of them can access the video games at home because it’s very expensive.

She needs a loan to buy video games and two television sets because being up-to-date with the games is fundamental for her business.  The most popular videos in her business are Play Station 2.  Among her plans is to expand the business more and to set up more video game consoles as well as to sell Nintendo accessories.

loans.use: to buy video games and two television sets.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: El sr Alejandro esta reconstruyendo su casa por que fue banalizada, y le quitaron toda la instalaciones eléctricas con el préstamo le ayudaran para comenzar a restablecer los servicios y mas adelante con las ventanas e ir mejorando la calidad de su vivienda. El sr Alejandro esta casado con la sra Noemí  quien se dedica a las labores del hogar. El propósito de ellos es establecerse en la ciudad de manera definitiva y tener su propio patrimonio estable ya que cuando se fueron de la ciudad descuidaron la casa y cuando volvieron ya no tenían servicio eléctrico y ahora tiene que empezar de cero a acondicionar su hogar.
texts.en:
Alejandro is rebuilding his house because it was vandalized and all the electrical installations were stolen.  With the loan he will be able to start reinstating the various utilities and later on improve the quality of his dwelling with the installation of windows.  

Alejandro is married to Noemí who does domestic chores.  Their goal is to settle in the city permanently and to have their own stable assets.  When they left the city they neglected their house and when they returned they no longer had electricity and now they have to start over from zero making their house livable.

loans.use: to install electrical wiring.

loans.name: Uysyf

texts.ru: Юсуф мужчина в возрасте 39 лет, женат, имеет 5 детей. Занимается перевозкой пассажиров по городу на собственном автомобиле последние 4 года. Это его работа является основным источником дохода для семьи. До этого он был на заработках в РФ. Так как его супруга одна вела хозяйство и занималась воспитанием пятерых детей он решил вернутся на родину и на заработанные в РФ деньги купить автомобиль и помогать своей супруге вести хозяйство и воспитывать детей. Этот кредит Юсуфа 3 по счету. Предыдущие 2 кредита он получал для мелкого ремонта своего автомобиля. На полученный кредит Юсуф хочет установить газовое оборудование, так как бензин очень подорожал и это будет ему обходиться дешевле.  Юсуф выражает свою благодарность нашей организации за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Uysyf is a 39 year-old man, who is married and has five children.  He has been involved in transporting passengers on his own car for the last four years.  This work is the sole source of income for his family.  Uysyf previously worked in the Russian Federation.  Because his wife ran the household by herself and was involved in raising their five children, he decided to return to his homeland and bought a car with the money he earned in Russia in order to help his wife run the household and raise the children.  This is Uysyf's third loan.  He obtained his previous two loan to make small repairs to his car.  Uysyf wants to use this loan to install gas equipment because gasoline cost rose a lot, and this upgrade would decrease his expenses.  Uysyf expresses his gratitude to our organization for the financial support.

loans.use: to install gas equipment for his car

loans.name: Shahodat

texts.ru: Шаходат добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она хорошая жена и мать, имеет трех сыновей. Шаодат работает официанткой в кафе в течении 6 лет.  Она трудиться из-за дня в день, что бы поддержать свою семью и детей. Шаходат работает одна , сын и муж находятся в Российской Федерации но каждый месяц они  по возможности присылают ей деньги. Она получает кредит в первые, этот кредит она использует  на покупку стиральной машины и кондиционера.Благодаря нашей поддержке она постепенно осуществляет свою мечту, тем самым улучшая свои условия проживания. Она всячески благодарит и надеется на дальнейшую поддержку.
texts.en: Shahodat is a kind and hardworking woman.  She is a good wife and mother, and has three sons.  Shahodat has been working as a waitress at a cafe for six years.  She works hard day-to-day in order to support her family and children.  Shahodat works alone, as her son and husband are in the Russian Federation, but send her money every month within their ability.  She is receiving this loan for the first time and plans to use it to purchase a washing machine and an air conditioner.  Thanks to our support, she is gradually achieving her dream and improving her living conditions.  She is very grateful and hopes for future support.

loans.use: to purchase household appliances

loans.name: Morena Guadalupe

texts.es:
Morena, solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en una mayor calidad de productos frescos para el negocio de mariscos, comprando pescado, camarones de varios tamaños y conchas, esto le permitirá poder atender a la clientela con una mayor disponibilidad de productos frescos.

El préstamo anterior le permitio mantener el negocio y continuar realizando mejores ventas a sus clientes, en sus planes está ampliar las zonas de comercialización con el objetivo de aumentar la clientela y también mejorar los ingresos.
texts.en:
Morena is asking for a new loan to buy a larger amount of fresh products for her seafood business.  She will buy fish, shrimp in various sizes and clams.  This will allow her to offer her customers a wider selection of fresh products.

The previous loan allowed her to stay in business and to continue to improve her sales.  Her plans include expanding her sales areas in order to increase her customer base and to also improve income.

loans.use: to buy fish and seafood.

loans.name: Mykaram

texts.ru: Мукарам – 45 лет, вдова, имеет на иждивении 2 детей. Занимается продажей женского белья и одежды. Опыт в этой сфере деятельности более 5 лет. Это занятие Мукаррам является основным источником дохода для семьи. Мукарам кредитуется в нашей организации с 2011 года. Этот кредит 2 по счету. Она ни разу не нарушала условия кредитования, а также доказала свою пунктуальность.  На полученный кредит хочет увеличить свой товарооборот. С целью расширения бизнеса она хочет получить кредит в размере 5500 сомони и надеется  на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Mykaram is 45 years old, a widow and supports two children.  She is involved in selling women's undergarments and clothing.  She has over five years of experience in this business area.  This business is primary source of income for her family.  Mykaram has been obtaining financing from our organization since 2011.  This is her second loan.  She has never violated the financing conditions and also proved her punctuality.  Mykaram wants to increase her goods turnover with this loan.  She wants to obtain a loan in the amount of 5500 somoni to expand her business and relies on your help and support.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothing

loans.name: Leonel

texts.es: Leonel, originario de León, pero habita en la ciudad de Estelí desde hace mas tres años, es dueño de un pequeño taller de soldadura, lleva doce años trabajando en esta actividad, con la cual mantiene a su familia, su negocio lo tiene en su casa de habitación. El está requiriendo el crédito para comprar hierro y herramientas para soldar pues las que tiene no le ayudan a terminar en menor tiempo los pedidos de sus clientes. Dentro de sus planes desea vender cocinas elaboras de zinc y hierro, asadores de carne hecho de manera artesanal y comprar herramientas modernas  de trabajo.
texts.en:
Leonel is from León originally but has been living in the city of Estelí for more than three years.  He owns a small welding shop; he’s been working in this activity for 12 years.  He supports his family this way.  The business is located at home.

He needs a loan to buy metal and welding tools because the ones he has now are inadequate and he can’t fill customer orders in less time.  Among his plans is to sell stoves made of zinc and iron, artisanal grills and to buy modern work tools.

loans.use: to buy metal and welding supplies.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: La Sra. Gloria de 43 años, casada, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace mas de 6 años, con lo cual ayuda a su esposo con los gastos de la casa ya que el labora en maquiladora y le descuentan la casa donde viven.  Solicita su crédito para compra de mercancía para generar más volumen de ventas y obtener más ganancias.
texts.en: Gloria, 43, is married and has been selling clothes for the last 6 years.  She helps her husband this way to cover household expenses since he works in an assembly plant and they discount his pay for the house they live in. She’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise in order to generate greater sales volume thus earning higher profits.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seafood.

loans.name: Olga Lidia

texts.es:
La sra. Olga se dedica desde hace un año a la venta de ropa nueva y también cuenta con en ingreso de su esposo quien realiza trabajos de albañilería. Su papa quien vive con ellos recibe una pensión mensual y apoya también en los gastos familiares.
La sra. Olga comenta que desde hace tiempo le diagnosticaron una enfermedad de la tiroides y el tratamiento y las medicinas para el mismo tienen un costo un poco alto, por lo que solicita el préstamo para poder solventar este  gasto y sobre llevar la enfermedad con calma.
texts.en:
Olga has been selling new clothes for the last year and she can also rely on income earned by her husband who works in construction.  Her father lives with them and receives a monthly pension that also helps with family expenses.

Olga comments that she was diagnosed some time ago with a disease of the thyroid and the medicine and treatments for it are somewhat costly which is why she’s asking for a loan to be able to cover this cost and be able to overcome the disease with peace of mind.

loans.use: to pay for medicine and treatment.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poder aumentar la variedad en el negocio, adquiriendo frutas y verduras frescas como papayas, sandías, Zapote que son de temporada, entre otros productos que son necesarias para mejorar el negocio y así satisfacer las necesidades y demandas de los clientes.

Ella considera que a través de estos préstamos está mejorando la capacidad en el mercado, tanto en los mariscos como en la fruta y verdura, creciendo cada vez más y mejorando también de condición económica en su familia.
texts.en:
María is asking for a new loan in order to be able to increase variety in the business acquiring fresh fruit and vegetables like papayas, watermelons and zapote which are in season, among other products needed to improve the business and meet customer needs and demand.

She considers that through these loans she’s improved market capacity both in the seafood and the fruit and vegetables growing more each time and also improving her family’s economic condition.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Djumagul

texts.ru: Джумагул 45 лет, одна воспитала 2 дочерей. С 2005 года Джумагул  занимается бизнесом в торговле продуктами питания, начав его со сбережений в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорству и настойчивости, на сегодняшний день  ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 8,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Джумагул обратилась в компанию «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на расширение ассортимента за счет покупки соков, сортов чая и мороженого. В будущем, Джумагул хочет увеличить свой бизнес, для того, чтобы иметь возможность оплаты контракта в ВУЗе для младшей дочери.
texts.en: Djumagul is 45 years old and raised two daughters by herself.  She has been involved in the business of selling food products since 2005, having started this business with savings in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to persistence and hard work, today her monthly profit amounts to about 8,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Djumagul requested a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to expand her selection of products by purchasing juices, tea varieties and ice-cream.  In the future, she wants to increase her business in order to have the ability to pay for her younger daughter's university contract.

loans.use: to expand product selection

loans.name: Meiyskul

texts.ru: Мейискул 50 лет, замужем, имеет 5 детей. В 1983 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Мейискул начала свой бизнес в животноводстве со стартовой суммы в 8,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорству и настойчивости, на сегодняшний день,  ее хозяйство насчитывает 2 дойные коровы с приплодом,  10 овец, ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 8,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. Также, Мейискул  обрабатывает 2,8 га земли, где выращивает болгарский перец и фасоль. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мейискул обратилась в компанию «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 голов нетели. В будущем, Мейискул хочет увеличить хозяйство и расширить свой бизнес за счет продажи молочных продукции в  соседний Казахстан.
texts.en: Meiyskul is 50 years old, married and has five children.  In search of a source of income for her family, she started her own business in animal husbandry in 1983 with an initial sum of 8,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to persistence and hard work, today her business contains two dairy cows with offspring and ten sheep, and the monthly profit from sales of milk and meat products amounts to about 8,000 som (KGS).  Meiyskul also works on 2.8 hectares of land, where she grows Bulgarian peppers and beans.  In order to further develop her business, Meiyskul requested a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy four heifers.  In the future, she wants to increase her farm and expand her business by selling dairy products to the neighboring Kazakhstan.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Agustin Alberto

texts.es:
Agustín es un hombre de 56 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Mala, él es una persona muy amable, entusiasta y trabajador, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; gracias a su deseo por superarse Agustín se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Derecho, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas come uno de sus platos favoritos, el cual es el riquísimo Arroz con Pollo.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, y gracias a la enseñanzas de su Padre, día a día Agustín trabaja en su pequeño negocio de gasfitería y refrigeración, desde tempranas horas de la mañana Agustín atiende a sus clientes, brindando servicios a domicilio, él dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 10 horas diarias, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien ya que sus clientes lo recomiendan por su rapidez, buen trabajo y por su trato amable.
Agustín de se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de herramientas, tales como sopletes, llaves, alicates, desatascador, cortatubos, fundidor, entre otros; de esta manera Agustín contará con su negocio mejor acondicionado, con ello espera poder atender mejor y a mas cantidad de clientes, así espera poder incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder seguir estudiando su carrera y así en un futuro no muy lejano sueña convertirse en un buen abogado.
texts.en: Agustín is a 56 year-old man, single, who lives in the town of Cañete, in the district of Mala. He is a very nice person, very enthusiastic and hardworking. He does his utmost to improve his lot in life, and thanks to his will to get ahead he is studying law. In his spare time, he likes to read or eat one of his favourite dishes, the very tasty chicken rice. With a lot of effort and enthusiasm, and thanks to what his father taught him, Agustín works every day at his small business: he does plumbing and repairs household appliances. From very early in the morning he tends to his clients at their homes; he works about ten hours a day. He is very happy with his work and thinks everything is going well, since his clients recommend him for his speed, the quality of his work and his affability. Agustín is very grateful for Kiva's help, since thanks to it he will be able to buy tools for his trade such as welding torches, wrenches, pliers, plungers, pipe cutters, smelting tools, and others. He hopes thus to be better equipped for his business and to be able to tend better to a larger number of clients, earning more money, which would help him immensely in order to keep studying and, in the future, make his dream of becoming a good lawyer come true.

loans.use: to buy tools for his trade.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en: Vestine is 31 years old. She has one child aged two. Her husband works in a private company. She sells clothes and has been selling clothes for the past two years. She wants the loan to buy more trousers to sell. The profits from the business will be used to put aside more savings.

loans.use: To buy more trousers to sell.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
Es originaria de esta ciudad y se ha dedicado a la preparación y venta de comida (platillos) desde hace más de 8 años y hace dos años inicio el negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos usados.  También cuenta con el ingreso de su esposo quien trabaja como mensajero en una empresa.  Tienen una hija quien actualmente estudia la preparatoria.
La sra. María desea invertir en comprar mercancía de temporada que son ropa y zapatos usados. Surtiendo su negocio ofrecerá mayor variedad a sus clientes y tendrá más oportunidad de ganancia. La mayor parte de lo que gana con su venta de ropa lo usa para la escuela de su hija y lo poco que sobra es para pagos básicos del hogar.
texts.en:
Maria Dolores is originally from Nuevo Laredo.  She has had a business making and selling food for more than eight years, and two years ago she started another business that sells used clothing and shoes.  Her husband also helps to support the family by working as a messenger for a private company.  They have a daughter who is currently in high school.

She wishes to buy used clothing and shoes that are appropriate for the current season.  By supplying her business she will be able to offer a greater selection of products to her customers, which will result in opportunities for greater earnings.

She uses most of her earnings to pay for her daughter's education, and what little is left goes toward her basic household expenses.

loans.use: to buy used clothing at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali, a single man who lives in the Kongowea area of Coast province, Kenya, owns green grocer, a business he has been operating for seven years. The challenge he faces is a lack of sufficient funds.

Ali, who learnt about Milango through a friend, is requesting a loan of 21,050 Kenya shillings to buy more fruits and groceries for his store. The extra income arising from the loan will be added to his savings to improve his living standard. Ali's plan for the future is to own a wholesale and open a cereal shop.

loans.use: to buy fruits and groceries.

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
Hamisi, a single man living in the Kongowea area of Coast province, Kenya, owns a second-hand clothes shop, an enterprise he has been operating for two years. The challenge he is facing is insufficient monitoring of the business.

Having learned about Milango through a friend, Hamisi is requesting a loan of 47,050 Kenya shillings to expand his business through the purchase of more clothes to resell. The extra income arising from the loan will be added to his savings to pay school fees for his siblings. His plan for the future is to sell wholesale.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for his business.

loans.name: Fifonsi Gbenondou Group

texts.fr: FIFONSI GBENONDOU est un groupe de sept personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Eugénie (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 41 ans. Eugénie est une veuve et mère de cinq enfants tous scolarisés, dont un seulement reste à sa charge. Eugénie n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Eugénie vit seule avec son enfant et assure seule ses différents besoins. Depuis une quinzaine d'année, Eugénie vend de la nourriture (Pâte de maïs accompagnée de poissons) à son domicile ; ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins. Eugénie s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue élargir son activité, Eugénie sollicite un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe FIFONSI GBENONDOU. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits. Le crédit précédent a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
FIFONSI GBENONDOU is a group of seven persons whose members reside in the same district. The group's representative, Eugénie (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 41 years old, a widow, and the mother of five children, all in school. Only one of the children remains in her care. 

Eugénie did not attend school. She lives by herself with her child and is alone in ensuring that her different needs are met. For about fifteen years, she has been selling food (polenta served with fish) out of her home. This enables her to support herself. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin.

Seeking to satisfy her customers and aiming to expand her business, Eugénie is requesting a second loan from ALIDé, along with the other members of the group FIFONSI GBENONDOU. This loan will serve them in responding better to the demands of their customers and to make more profit. The previous loan was indeed paid back.

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: Yesica Walesca

texts.es:
Yesica, de 33 años de edad, casada, tiene 2 hijos de 14 y 4 años de edad, uno de ellos estudia, su esposo trabaja como operario de maquina en una maquila, vive en una aldea del Negrito, Morazan, Yoro.
Yesica  ha sido una persona muy  habilidosa, pues hace más de un año decidió establecer su propio negocio de sala de belleza. Ella realiza trabajos de belleza en la comunidad, hace cortes de pelo, peinados, tintes, alisados, manicure y pedicure.  Actualmente está solicitando el segundo préstamo por 6,500 Lempiras para suplirse de producto como tintes, peróxido, quita esmalte champo, mascarillas etc. Ella es muy conocida  por la gente de la comunidad y la prefieren por su buen trabajo que realiza. Su meta es ampliar el negocio, crecer en clientes para obtener ingresos y darles un mejor estudio a sus hijos. Agradece a ODEF y a KIVA por el apoyo financiero, porque el préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho a mantenerlo estable y le genero ganancias.
texts.en:
Yesica, 33, is married and has two children who are 14 and 4 years old.  One of them attends school and her husband works as a machine operator in an assembly plant.  She lives in a village in Negrito, Morazan, Yoro.

Yesica has been a skilled person who over a year ago decided to open her own beauty salon.  She provides beauty services in her community.  She does haircuts, styling, coloring, straightening, manicure and pedicure.  She is currently requesting her second loan for 6500 lempiras to stock up on hair color, peroxide, nail polish remover, shampoo, face masks, etc.  She’s very well known by the people in her community and they prefer her because of the good work she does.  Her goal is to expand the business acquiring more customers to improve income and provide a better education for her children.  She thanks ODEF and KIVA for the financial support because the previous loan helped her much to stay in business and generate profits.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Bolotshi Plus Group

texts.en:
Mathy is the chairwoman of the Community Bank named “Bolotshi Plus”. It is composed of 14 members, united in solidarity for receiving Kiva loans with the goal of developing their businesses.

Mathy has been in the micro-business world since 2000. She worked hard with determination and good management and savings in order to stabilize her business. She started with one bundle of second-hand clothing and is up to five bundles today. 

Mathy sells at the market in the mid-eastern area of Kinshasa and her business makes US$35 per week. Mathy has already obtained and correctly repaid nine loans from Microfinance Institution HOPE DRC. She will increase her stock of merchandise with her next loan by buying two bundles of second-hand clothing and reselling them at a profit. 

Mathy is confident of her business and she is determined to someday be a second-hand clothing importer and provider for markets in DRC in general and Kinshasa in particular. She is 40 years old, married, and the mother of six children between the ages 7 and 22, of whom five attend school.

loans.use: to purchase two bundles of second-hand clothing to resell at a profit

loans.name: Anaclet

texts.en: Anaclet is 33 years old. He is a father of two children. He sells different cereals and has been in the business for seven years. With the loan, he wants to buy wheat, sorghum, millet and peanuts to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a house for his residence.

loans.use: To buy more wheat, sorghum, peanuts, and millet to sell.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en:
Rachael lives in Kongowea area of Coast province, Kenya. She is single. She owns a retail shop, a business which she has been operating for four years.

She learnt about Milango through a friend with an aim of accessing credit to improve the business operations. The challenge she is facing is low profits due to the seasonal market.

Rachael is applying for a loan of 41,900 Kenya shillings to purchase maize flour, sugar, rice and cereals. The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to improve the living standard her family. Her plan for the future is to expand to a wholesale business.

loans.use: To purchase maize flour, sugar, rice and cereals.

loans.name: Houenoussou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe HOUENOUSSOU est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Estelle est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Estelle est âgée de 40 ans et vit au Bénin. Estelle a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Estelle est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Séraphin et est mère de quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et dont deux restent à sa charge. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins, Estelle mène comme activité depuis dix ans, la vente de produits vivriers et de charbon de bois à son domicile. Estelle s’approvisionne dans des régions du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Estelle sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe HOUENOUSSOU, un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group HOUENOUSSOU comprises three persons who reside in the same district. This is the fourth time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to boost business. The group's representative, Estelle, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 40 years old and lives in Benin. She dropped out of secondary school. She is married to a furniture maker named Séraphin and is the mother of four children, all in school. Two of the children remain in her care. 

To meet her needs, Estelle has had a business selling staple foods and charcoal for ten years out of her home. She gets her supplies from some of the regions of Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and revenues, Estelle, along with the other members of the group HOUENOUSSOU, is requesting a fourth loan from ALIDé. The previous loans were indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy grains and some charcoal

loans.name: Caritas Alegres  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Caritas Alegres está formado por 10 socias quienes en su mayoría son compañeras de trabajo, laboran diariamente en un mercado de la ciudad, algunas también laboran en diferentes actividades, son mujeres amables, gentiles y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida como la Atenas del Ecuador, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, el carisma de su gente, sus paisajes, su gastronomía que es muy variada y el calor de su gente hacen de esta ciudad un lugar muy especial.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Gladys, tiene 29 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 13, 11, 8, 5 y 2 años de edad, su primera hija está estudiando en un colegio de la ciudad y sus tres hijos siguientes estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus suegros compartiendo los gastos del hogar.

La Señora Gladys se dedica al cuidado de su hogar, pero para aportar a la economía de su hogar labora hace 2 meses en una carpintería ya que le gusta trabajar en esta actividad y trabaja de lunes a sábados. En eventos sociales se dedica a la venta de confitería, gaseosas, aguas y más, labora en este negocio hace 9 años.
 
Se encuentra en el cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de confitería y útiles escolares para sus hijos.
 
Su sueño es tener su propio taller de carpintería ya que conoce mucho de este arte.
texts.en:
The “Caritas Alegres” (Cheerful Little Faces) communal bank has 10 members most of which are coworkers.  They work daily in a market in the city and some of them also work in various activities.  They are kind, nice women who still preserve the culture and traditions of their peoples.  They live in different parts of Cuenca, a city known as the Athens of Ecuador and which has been a Cultural Heritage of Humanity since 1999.  The charisma of its people, its scenery and its cuisine which is quite varied and the warm-heartedness of its people make this city very special.

One of the group members is Gladys, 29.  She’s married and has had five children who are 13, 11, 8, 5 and 2 years of age.  Her oldest daughter is attending secondary school in the city and the next three children attend a little local elementary school.  Her husband works as a private employee.  She does not have a house of her own.  She shares her in-laws’ house sharing all household expenses with them.

Gladys takes care of her home but also contributes to household economy.  For the last two months she’s been working in carpentry because she likes this activity; she works Monday through Saturday.  She’s also worked for the last nine years providing snacks, soft-drinks, water and others for social events.

This is this fourth loan in her communal bank and she will use it to buy sweets and school supplies for her children.  Her dream is to own her a carpentry shop since she’s quite knowledgeable in this art.

loans.use: to buy sweets and school supplies.

loans.name: Munay Soncco Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece  al banco comunal MUNAY  SONCCO; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Wanchaq en la provincia  de Cusco departamento de Cusco.

La socia Mirian,la socia tiene 19 años y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de papas ,la socia viaja al  distrito de Andahuaylillas para comprar su mercadería al por mayor y de esta manera poder vender en  uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia a la vez es estudia en una preuniversitaria ,ella desea postular a la universidad nacional del Cusco a la carrera de contabilidad, por lo cual la socia se esfuerza mucho ,siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de papas al por mayor.

Los otros socios se dedican a la venta de materiales de construcción, panadería, venta de arena, venta de ladrillos, tienda de abarrotes, venta de productos de belleza, internet.

Las personas que salen adjuntas en la foto son socias que pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.

La socia se  siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas
texts.en:
Mirian, 19, is a member of the “Munay Soncco” communal bank located in Wanchaq District in Cusco Province and Department.  She’ single and alternates her daily chores with a business selling potatoes.  She travels to Andahuaylillas District to buy her merchandise at wholesale and then be able to resell it in one of the markets in the city of Cusco.  At the same time, she’s taking pre-university courses because she wants to enroll at the Universidad Nacional del Cusco in accounting.  She strives hard for this and supports herself this way.  She requests the loan to buy potatoes at wholesale.

The other group members’ businesses are construction materials, bakery, sand sales, brick sales, grocery store, beauty product sales and Internet access.

The people in the inserted photos are members who asked permission to arrive late at the meeting because of work commitments.

Mirian is grateful for the granted loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy potatoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL”; El banco está ubicado en la  provincia de Anta, distrito de Zurite, departamento Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eduarda; la socia tiene 68 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 9 hijos en total, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la ganadería y crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, la socia lleva años dedicándose a esta actividad la cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia,la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que más le solicitan y en las ferias que se realizan en el distrito de Anta, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de alimento para sus animalitos como alfalfa,maiz y para comprar mas cuyes para su negocio. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SOLIDARIDAD TAMBO REAL”; El banco está ubicado en la  provincia de Anta, distrito de Zurite, departamento Cusco.

Eduarda belongs to the “Solidaridad Tambo Real” communal bank located in Anta Province, Zurite District, Cusco Department.  She’s 68-years-old, married and has a total of nine children.  She alternates her daily chores with raising cattle and small farm animals like guinea pigs and chickens.  She’s been in this activity for years and does well thanks to the effort she puts into it daily.  She raises these little animals and then sells them to customers who request them in the various street markets that occur in Anta district.  She is a very responsible, hardworking person and this is the way she supports herself.

She’s requesting a loan to buy feed like alfalfa and corn for her little animals and to buy more guinea pigs for her business.  She’s happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and to buy more guinea pigs.

loans.name: Roy Renzo

texts.es:
Roy es un joven de 20 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Mala con sus padres y hermanos, a pesar de su corta edad él es muy trabajador, entusiasta y alegre, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, tuvo que trabajar desde muy joven, por ello no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería de Sistemas que tanto desea, pero sueña con poder hacerlo muy pronto; en sus ratos libres le gusta ver películas y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.
Gracias al apoyo de su padre, quien le enseño a majear, día a día Roy trabaja como chofer de taxi en su ciudad, desde tempranas horas de la mañana él dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y puede atender a un promedio de25 clientes, adicionalmente en algunas oportunidades Roy trabaja como obrero de construcción; él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su trato amable y respetuoso hacia los demás.
Roy se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la reparación y el mantenimiento general de su vehículo; de esta manera Roy tendrá su auto operativo y en buenas condiciones para poder seguir brindando sus servicios de taxi, así con ello espera poder incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales en un futuro no muy lejano desea utilizar para adquirir un auto nuevo y con ello espera poder seguir trabajando para apoyar a su familia y juntos salir adelante.
texts.en:
Roy, 20, is a young, single man living in the city of Cañete in Mala District with his parents and siblings.  Despite his young age he’s very hardworking, enthusiastic and cheerful who very much wants to get ahead.  Unfortunately, in order to help his parents with household expenses he had to start working very young and because of this has been unable to study computer programming which he so desires but he dreams with being able to do so very soon.  In his free time he enjoys watching movies and sometimes cooks a delicious “Ají de Gallina” to share with his family.

Thanks to his father’s support who taught him how to drive, today Roy works day to day as a taxi driver in his city.  He starts working very early in the morning and works for about 12 hours daily in order to have an average of 25 customers.  Sometimes Roy also works in construction.  He feels good doing his work and feels that he does well because of the kind, respectful way he treats others.

Roy is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to repair and service his vehicle.  In this way Roy will have a car in good operating conditions to continue offering taxi services thus increasing his income which in the not too distant future he plans to use to buy a new car to continue working to support his family so that they can get ahead together.

loans.use: to service and repair his car.

loans.name: Nonvigbe Group

texts.fr: Le groupement NONVIGBE est composé de onze personnes qui résident dans le même quartier et qui exercent des activités génératrices de revenus. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Ayaba Antoinette est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Ayaba Antoinette est âgée de 56 ans et vit au Bénin. Ayaba Antoinette est mariée à un certain Coffi et a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés, dont deux sont à sa charge. Ayaba Antoinette et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants dans une ville du Bénin. Ayaba Antoinette supporte avec son mari les diverses charges de la maison. Pour y parvenir, Ayaba Antoinette vend des produits vivriers et de façon secondaire, des tissus et des chaussures à son domicile depuis une trentaine d'année. Ayaba Antoinette s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Ayaba Antoinette désire satisfaire un plus grand nombre de clients par ses produits, mais Ayaba Antoinette ne dispose pas suffisamment de moyens financiers pouvant lui permettre de rehausser le niveau de son activité. C’est pour ce faire que Ayaba Antoinette sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement NONVIGBE.
texts.en:
The group NONVIGBE comprises eleven persons who reside in the same district and have revenue-generating businesses. The group's representative, Ayaba Antoinette, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 56 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a man named Coffi and has four children, all having education. Two of the children are in her care. She and her husband live together with their children in a city in Benin.

Ayaba Antoinette, along with her husband, covers the diverse household expenses. To do so, she has been selling staple foods, and secondarily, she sells fabrics and shoes out of her home, for about thirty years. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin.

Ayaba Antoinette would like to satisfy a larger number of customers with her products, but she lacks the sufficient financial means enabling her to raise her level of business. This is why she is requesting a loan from ALIDé, along with the other members of the group NONVIGBE.

loans.use: to buy grains

loans.name: Afepeb Group

texts.fr: AFEPEB est un groupe constitué de quatre personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. Le représentant (celui qui a la main levée sur la photo) se nomme Germain. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupe sollicite pour la quatrième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Germain est âgé de 55 ans et est marié à Félicité. Le couple a cinq enfants, tous scolarisés, dont deux à leur charge. Germain a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Germain vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants et assure ensemble avec sa femme les diverses charges de la maison. Pour satisfaire ses besoins et ceux de sa famille, Germain vend de l’huile de palme depuis près de dix huit ans à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Germain est gérant d'une ferme dans sa région. Germain s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Ce quatrième prêt permettra à Germain et aux autres membres du groupe AFEPEB, de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu. Les crédits consentis antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group AFEPEB consists of four members who all live in the same district. The group’s representative is Germain, seen with his hand raised in the photo. To bolster their working capital, the group is seeking financial assistance from ALIDé for the fourth time. 

Germain, age 55, left school at the secondary level. He is married to a woman named Félicité, and the couple have five children who have all received schooling. Two of them are still in their care. Germain and his wife live together with their children, and the couple handle the various household responsibilities together. 

To provide for himself and his family, Germain has been selling palm oil from his home for nearly 18 years. He buys his supplies in a region of Benin. As a secondary activity, he also runs a local farm. 

This fourth loan will help Germain and the other members of the group AFEPEB to bolster their activities, expand their customer base and increase their revenue. All past loans were successfully repaid.

loans.use: to buy jugs of palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Jaqueline

texts.en: Jaqueline is 40 years old and has two children, 4 and 18, who go to school. She has been selling clothes for two years. With the loan, she wants to buy more clothes to sell. She plans to use the profits to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hats.

loans.name: Immaculee

texts.en: Immaculee is 31 years old and the mother of two children. She has been selling trousers for four years. With the loan, she wants to buy more trousers to sell. The profits from the business will be used to increase her savings for the future expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy more trousers to sell.

loans.name: Bahati

texts.en:
Bahati is 39 years old, married, and has six children, four of whom attend school. Her husband is a farmer. She supports her family through the sale of coconuts at the market. She has been in the business for eight years.

Due to increased expenses in her business, Bahati is requesting a loan of 10,000 KES which she will use to buy more coconuts to sell. With the anticipated profits, she plans to open a kiosk.

Bahati is looking forward to increasing her income, which will enable her to supply the basic commodities for her family. She is determined to educate her children and give them a bright future.

loans.use: to buy more coconuts to sell.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine is 36 years old. She sells shoes and has been in the business for four years. She wants the loan to buy more shoes to sell. With the profits from the business, she plans to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to buy more used shoes to sell.

loans.name: Baby

texts.en:
Baby lives in the Likoni area of Coast Province, Kenya. She is married and has one child. She owns a charcoal and coconut business, which she has been operating for one year. She started the business through her mother’s savings.
